title: Diamond Emerald Haaram with South Sea Pearls - A Timeless Classic
materials: Crafted in shimmering 18K Gold with Hyderabadi polish
featuring meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds (6.91 carats
and lustrous South Sea Pearls (22.85 carats
12 pearls on the necklace and 9.85 carats
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases intricate floral and paisley motifs, embellished with pavé-set diamonds. The emeralds, one in the center of each of the focal points are the jewel in the crown. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of elegance and tradition. The central pendant features a detailed filigree design. This piece blends antique charm with modern craftsmanship.
colors: Primarily gold and white from the diamonds
accented by the vibrant green of the emeralds and the deep red of the ruby. South Sea Pearls are white with a creamy undertone.
occasions: or significant festive occasions like Diwali
or a Seemantham (శీమంతం) ceremony. Also suitable for grand receptions and formal events.
description: This stunning Diamond Emerald Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an heirloom piece embodying South Indian heritage. Its exquisite craftsmanship, premium materials, and timeless design ensure it will be cherished for generations. It's an investment in beauty, tradition, and lasting value, and a statement piece of lasting importance in any jewlery collection. Crafted with precision and care by our expert artisans.
